CommandDefinition.Name: startschedulerthread
CommandDefinition.Description: Starts a new scheduler thread if the scheduler has stopped due to a severe exception.

BoolOption.Name: c
BoolOption.Description: Checks for broken orders and aborts the restart if any are found.

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Tries to repair broken orders inside the Scheduler by reallocating their capacities and vetos before restarting.
